questions.title: 你的问题是你太自大了。
questions.answer: Your problem is you are too arrogant.

questions.title: 你的问题就是无论什么样的衣服你穿都不好看。
questions.answer: Your problem is whatever kind of clothes are not fit for you.

questions.title: 关键的问题是没有钱，我们什么都做不了。
questions.answer: The critical problem is we can do nothing without money.

questions.title: 总经理说你的问题是在我们的聚会上你的身高不够高。
questions.answer: The general manager says your problem is you are not tall enough to showin our party.

questions.title: 你的问题是没有人想要关心你的感觉。
questions.answer: Your problem is there is nobody who wants to care about your feelings.

title: ——本质的问题就是关键的问题。
——你已经发现了核心问题。

answer.en: The essential problem is the critical problem.
You already find the central problem.

title: ——我哪里不好了？
——你的问题就是你的心里没有我。

answer.en: Your problem is that you don't have me at heart.

title: ——我为什么没有按时完成任务？
——你的问题就在于你不珍惜时间。

answer.en: Why do I finish the task on time?
Your problem is you didn't value time.
